channel.title: Meetup before/after Microconf in Barcelona
channel.description:
Microconf is here in Barcelona in the next few days. I decided not to go to the conference this year, but as Barcelona is my adopted home city, I'm happy to meetup with anyone from this forum who might be in Barcelona for Microconf.
Let me know if you are interested, and I can try to organise a time/day/place.
